body: { "text":"MRN Number : ", "border":[ false, false, false, false ] ,"style": "tm-cols-table"}, { "text":"{{mrnNumber}}", "border":[ false, false, false, false ] ,"style": "tm-cols-table"}, { "text":"Receipt Date : ", "border":[ false, false, false, false ] ,"style": "tm-cols-table"}, { "text":"{{receiptDate}}", "border":[ false, false, false, false ] ,"style": "tm-cols-table"}
